answers.text:
I need a copy of the quarterly statement. Where can I find it?


I need a copy of the quarterly statement. Where can I find it?

answers.author: Amy Cervantes
answers.text:
Seems odd that no one from ICMA responded to either question, above, in the past two years.  I guess ICMA doesn't monitor the questions.


Seems odd that no one from ICMA responded to either question, above, in the past two years.  I guess ICMA doesn't monitor the questions.

answers.author: Jesse Himes
answers.text:
Hi Tim and Maria,
I believe you are asking about a retirement account, you may be looking for IMCA-RC. (ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations). You can visit their website www.icma-rc.org or call 1-800-669-7400 in order to get the information you need. I apologize for the failure of getting a timely response from a member of our staff.
Amy,
Thank you for bringing this unanswered question to our attention. We do our best to address each question in a timely manner but unfortunately some may fall through the cracks.
I hope I was able to remedy this situation for everyone. If there is anything else I can do for you all please let me know.
Jesse Himes, Knowledge Network Intern, jhimes@icma.org
